anya-e0103n3:1_1: suvisuddhe nirupakkilese. Imasmiṁ sīleti yathāvutte catupārisuddhisīle. “Cittaṁ bhāvaya”nti
anya-e0103n3:1_2: imameva desanaṁ sandhāyāha “atisaṅkhepadesitattā”ti. Ko samādhīti sarūpapucchā. Kenaṭṭhena
anya-e0103n3:1_3: samādhīti kena atthena samādhīti vuccati, “samādhī”ti padaṁ kaṁ abhidheyyatthaṁ nissāya
anya-e0103n3:2_0: “Ko samādhī”ti kāmañcāyaṁ sarūpapucchā, vibhāgavantānaṁ pana sarūpavibhāvanaṁ vibhāgadassanamukheneva
anya-e0103n3:2_1: hotīti vibhāgo tāva anavasesato dassetabbo. Taṁdassane ca ayamādīnavoti dassetuṁ
anya-e0103n3:2_2: “samādhi bahuvidho”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha bahuvidhoti kusalādivasena anekavidho. Nānappakārakoti
anya-e0103n3:2_4: sādheyyāti lokiyasamādhissa bhāvanā idha adhippetattho, tañca na sādheyya. Jhānavimokkhādīsu
anya-e0103n3:2_5: hi samādhiṁ uddharitvā tassa labbhamānehi vibhāgehi vissajjane kariyamāne jhānavibhaṅgādīsu
anya-e0103n3:2_6: āgato sabbo samādhipabhedo vissajjetabbo siyā. Tathā ca sati yvāyaṁ lokiyasamādhissa
anya-e0103n3:2_7: bhāvanāvidhi adhippeto, tassa vissajjanāya okāsova na bhaveyya. Kiñca yenassa tikacatukkajhānikena
anya-e0103n3:2_9: vehapphalādivasena dasavidho vā ekādasavidho vā bhavappabhedo nippajjati. Svāssa
anya-e0103n3:2_10: pavattivibhāgo ayaṁ soti niddhāretvā vuccamāno vikkhepāya siyā, yathā taṁ avisaye.
anya-e0103n3:2_11: Tenāha “uttari ca vikkhepāya saṁvatteyyā”ti. Kusalacittekaggatāti kusalā anavajjasukhavipākalakkhaṇā cittekaggatā.
anya-e0103n3:3_0: Cittacetasikānaṁ samaṁ avisāravasena sampiṇḍentassa viya ādhānaṁ samādhānaṁ. Avisāralakkhaṇo
anya-e0103n3:3_1: hi samādhi, sampiṇḍanaraso ca. Sammā avikkhipanavasena ādhānaṁ samādhānaṁ. Avikkhepalakkhaṇo
anya-e0103n3:3_2: vā hi samādhi, vikkhepaviddhaṁsanaraso cāti. Svāyaṁ yasmā ekārammaṇe cittassa ṭhitihetu,
anya-e0103n3:3_3: tasmā “ṭhapananti vuttaṁ hotī”ti āha. Tathā hesa “cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhitī”ti
anya-e0103n3:3_5: hissa aṭṭhakathāyaṁ dīpacciṭṭhiti nidassitā. Ānubhāvenāti balena, paccayabhāvenāti
anya-e0103n3:3_6: attho. Avikkhipamānāti na vikkhipamānā vūpasamamānā. Upasamapaccupaṭṭhāno hi samādhi.
anya-e0103n3:3_7: Etenassa vikkhepapaṭipakkhataṁ dasseti. Avippakiṇṇāti avisaṭā. Etena avisāralakkhaṇataṁ.
anya-e0103n3:4_0: Sayaṁ na vikkhipati, sampayuttā vā na vikkhipanti etenāti avikkhepo, so lakkhaṇaṁ
anya-e0103n3:4_1: etassāti avikkhepalakkhaṇo. Vikkhepaṁ viddhaṁseti, tathā vā sampajjatīti vikkhepaviddhaṁsanaraso.
anya-e0103n3:4_2: Uddhacce avikampanavasena paccupatiṭṭhati, sampayuttānaṁ vā taṁ paccupaṭṭhapetīti
anya-e0103n3:5_0: 39. Avikkhepalakkhaṇaṁ nāma samādhissa āveṇiko sabhāvo, na tenassa koci vibhāgo labbhatīti
anya-e0103n3:5_1: āha “avikkhepalakkhaṇena tāva ekavidho”ti. Sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇe appento viya
anya-e0103n3:5_2: pavattatīti vitakko appanā. Tathā hi so “appanā byappanā”ti niddiṭṭho. Tappamukhatāvasena
anya-e0103n3:5_3: pana sabbasmiṁ mahaggatānuttare jhānadhamme “appanā”ti aṭṭhakathāvohāro. Tathā tassa
anya-e0103n3:5_4: anuppattiṭṭhānabhūte parittajhāne upacāravohāro. Gāmādīnaṁ samīpaṭṭhāne gāmūpacārādisamaññā
anya-e0103n3:5_5: viyāti āha “upacārappanāvasena duvidho”ti. Idha pana samādhivasena veditabbaṁ. Lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena
anya-e0103n3:5_6: lokoti vuccati vaṭṭaṁ, tappariyāpannatāya loke niyutto, tattha vā viditoti lokiyo.
anya-e0103n3:5_7: Tattha apariyāpannatāya lokato uttaro uttiṇṇoti lokuttaro. Kāmañcettha lokiyasamādhi
anya-e0103n3:5_8: bhāvetabbabhāvena gayhati, ubhayaṁ pana ekajjhaṁ gahetvā tato itaraṁ niddhāretuṁ
anya-e0103n3:5_10: vattatīti sappītiko, pītisampayutto. Natthi etassa pītīti nippītiko, pītivippayutto.
anya-e0103n3:5_11: Tesaṁ vasena. Sukhena saha ekuppādādibhāvaṁ gatoti sukhasahagato, sukhasampayuttoti
anya-e0103n3:5_12: attho. Upekkhāsahagatepi eseva nayo. Upekkhāti cettha adukkhamasukhavedanā adhippetā.
anya-e0103n3:5_13: Sā hi sukhadukkhākārapavattiṁ upekkhati majjhattākārasaṇṭhitattā. Sukhasahagata-padena
anya-e0103n3:5_14: cettha sappītiko, nippītikekadeso ca saṅgahito, upekkhāsahagata-padena pana nippītikekadesovāti
anya-e0103n3:6_0: Sabhāvato, paccayato, phalato ca majjhimapaṇītehi nihīno, tesaṁ vā guṇehi parihīnoti
anya-e0103n3:6_1: hīno, attano paccayehi padhānabhāvaṁ nīto paṇīto, ubhinnaṁ majjhe bhavo majjhimo.
anya-e0103n3:6_2: Sampayogavasena pavattamānena saha vitakkena savitakko, saha vicārena savicāro, savitakko
anya-e0103n3:6_3: ca so savicāro cāti savitakkasavicāro. Ādi-saddena avitakkavicāramatto, avitakkāvicāro
anya-e0103n3:6_4: ca gahito. Tattha vicārato uttari vitakkena sampayogābhāvato avitakko ca so vicāramatto
anya-e0103n3:6_5: cāti avitakkavicāramatto. Visesanivattiattho vā matta-saddo. Savitakkasavicāro hi
anya-e0103n3:6_6: samādhi vitakkavisiṭṭhena vicārena savicāro, ayaṁ pana vicāramattena vitakkasaṅkhātavisesarahitena,
anya-e0103n3:6_7: tasmā avitakkavicāramatto. Atha vā bhāvanāya pahīnattā vitakkābhāvenāyaṁ vicāramatto,
anya-e0103n3:6_8: na vicārato aññassa attano sampayuttadhammassa kassaci abhāvāti dassetuṁ avitakka-vacanena
anya-e0103n3:6_9: vicāramatta-padaṁ visesetvā vuttaṁ. Ubhayarahito avitakkāvicāro. Pītisahagatādivasenāti
anya-e0103n3:6_11: vuttanayameva. Paṭipakkhehi samantato khaṇḍitattā paritto. Parittanti vā appamattakaṁ
anya-e0103n3:6_12: vuccati, ayampi appānubhāvatāya paritto viyāti paritto. Kilesavikkhambhanato, vipulaphalato,
anya-e0103n3:6_13: dīghasantānato ca mahantabhāvaṁ gato, mahantehi vā uḷāracchandādīhi gato paṭipannoti
anya-e0103n3:6_14: mahaggato. Ārammaṇakaraṇavasenāpi natthi etassa pamāṇakaradhammā, tesaṁ vā paṭipakkhoti appamāṇo.
anya-e0103n3:7_0: Paṭipajjati jhānaṁ etāyāti paṭipadā, pubbabhāgabhāvanā. Dukkhā kicchā paṭipadā etassāti
anya-e0103n3:7_1: dukkhāpaṭipado. Pakatipaññāya abhivisiṭṭhattā abhiññā nāma appanāvahā bhāvanāpaññā,
anya-e0103n3:7_2: dandhā mandā abhiññā etassāti dandhābhiñño. Dukkhāpaṭipado ca so dandhābhiñño cāti
anya-e0103n3:7_4: jhānānaṁ aṅgabhāvavasena, catukkanayavasena cetaṁ vuttaṁ. Hānabhāgiyādivasenāti hānakoṭṭhāsikādivasena.
anya-e0103n3:9_1: vasenāti imesaṁ dasannaṁ kammaṭṭhānānaṁ vasena. “Pubbabhāge ekaggatā”ti iminā appanāya
anya-e0103n3:9_2: upakārakanānāvajjanupacārassapi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo, na ekāvajjanasseva. Appanāsamādhīnanti
anya-e0103n3:9_4: gotrabhu. Aparitto samādhīti dassetuṁ “paṭhamassa jhānassā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:10_1: vuttaṁ. Siyā sappītiko, siyā nippītikoti aniyamavacanaṁ upacārasamādhisāmaññena sabbesampi
anya-e0103n3:10_2: vā jhānānaṁ nānāvajjanavīthiyaṁ upacārasamādhi siyā sappītiko, siyā nippītiko. Ekāvajjanavīthiyaṁ
anya-e0103n3:10_3: pana ādito dukatikajjhānānaṁ upacārasamādhi sappītikova, itaresaṁ nippītikova, visabhāgavedanassa
anya-e0103n3:10_4: cittassa āsevanapaccayatābhāvato, ekavīthiyaṁ vedanāparivattanābhāvato ca. Siyā sukhasahagato,
anya-e0103n3:10_5: siyā upekkhāsahagatoti etthāpi vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. Tattha pana “dukatikajjhānāna”nti
anya-e0103n3:12_0: Paṭiladdhamattoti adhigatamatto anāsevito abahulīkato. So hi paridubbalabhāvena hīno
anya-e0103n3:12_1: hoti. Nātisubhāvitoti ativiya paguṇabhāvaṁ apāpito. Subhāvitoti suṭṭhu bhāvito sammadeva
anya-e0103n3:12_2: paguṇataṁ upanīto. Tenāha “vasippatto”ti. Chandādīnaṁ hīnatādivasenāpi imesaṁ hīnāditā
anya-e0103n3:12_3: veditabbā. Tathā hi uḷārapuññaphalakāmatāvasena pavattito hīno, lokiyābhiññāsampādanāya
anya-e0103n3:12_4: pavattito majjhimo, vivekakāmatāya ariyabhāve ṭhitena pavattito paṇīto. Attahitāya
anya-e0103n3:12_5: bhavasampattiatthaṁ pavattito vā hīno, kevalaṁ alobhajjhāsayena pavattito majjhimo,
anya-e0103n3:12_6: parahitāya pavattito paṇīto. Vaṭṭajjhāsayena vā pavattito hīno, vivekajjhāsayena
anya-e0103n3:12_7: pavattito majjhimo, vivaṭṭajjhāsayena lokuttarapādakatthaṁ pavattito paṇīto.
anya-e0103n3:13_0: Saddhiṁ upacārasamādhināti sabbesampi jhānānaṁ upacārasamādhinā saha. Vitakkamatteyeva
anya-e0103n3:13_1: ādīnavaṁdisvāti vitakkeyeva oḷārikato upaṭṭhahante “cittassa khobhakaradhammo aya”nti
anya-e0103n3:13_2: ādīnavaṁ disvā vicārañca santato manasi karitvā. Tenāha “vicāre adisvā”ti. Taṁ sandhāyāti
anya-e0103n3:13_3: taṁ evaṁ paṭiladdhaṁ samādhiṁ sandhāya. Etaṁ “avitakkavicāramatto samādhī”ti dutiyapadaṁ
anya-e0103n3:14_0: Tesvevāti tesu eva catukkapañcakanayesu. Tatiye catuttheti catukkanaye tatiye, pañcakanaye
anya-e0103n3:14_1: catuttheti yojetabbaṁ. Avasāneti dvīsupi nayesu pariyosānajjhāne. Yathākkamaṁ catutthe,
anya-e0103n3:14_2: pañcame vā. Pītisukhasahagato vāti etthāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n3:14_3: Ettha ca satipi pītisahagatassāpi samādhissa sukhasahagatatte tīṇipi padāni asaṅkarato
anya-e0103n3:14_4: dassetuṁ nippītikasukhato sappītikasukhassa visesadassanatthaṁ satthu pītitikadesanāti
anya-e0103n3:14_5: nippītikasseva sukhassa vasena sukhasahagato samādhi gahitoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n3:17_0: Paṭhamasamannāhāro bhāvanaṁ ārabhantassa “pathavī pathavī”tiādinā kammaṭṭhāne paṭhamābhiniveso.
anya-e0103n3:17_1: Tassa tassa jhānassa upacāranti nīvaraṇavitakkavicāranikantiādīnaṁ vūpasame thirabhūtaṁ
anya-e0103n3:17_2: kāmāvacarajjhānaṁ. “Yāva appanā”ti iminā pubbabhāgapaññāya eva abhiññābhāvo vutto
anya-e0103n3:17_3: viya dissatīti vadanti. Appanāpaññā pana abhiññāva. Yadaggena hi pubbabhāgapaññāya
anya-e0103n3:18_1: upacārādhigamato pubbe asappāyasevitāya dukkhā paṭipadā. Pacchā asappāyasevitāya
anya-e0103n3:18_2: dandhā abhiññā hoti. Sappāyasevinoti etthāpi eseva nayo. Pubbabhāgeti upacārajjhānādhigamato
anya-e0103n3:18_3: orabhāge. Aparabhāgeti tato uddhaṁ. Tassa vomissakatāti yo pubbabhāge asappāyaṁ sevitvā
anya-e0103n3:18_4: aparabhāge sappāyasevī, tassa dukkhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā. Itarassa sukhā paṭipadā
anya-e0103n3:18_5: dandhābhiññā hoti. Evaṁ paṭhamacatutthānaṁ vomissakatāya dutiyatatiyāti attho. Akatapalibodhupacchedassa
anya-e0103n3:18_6: saparipanthatāya paṭipadā dukkhā hoti, itarassa sukhā. Asampāditaappanākosallassa
anya-e0103n3:18_7: ñāṇassa avisadatāya dandhā abhiññā hoti, visadatāya khippā abhiññā.
anya-e0103n3:19_1: samathavipassanāsu asato, sato ca adhikārassa vasena. Taṇhāya samādhissa ujupaṭipakkhattā
anya-e0103n3:19_2: sā samathapaṭipadāya paripanthinīti āha “taṇhābhibhūtassa hi dukkhā paṭipadā hotī”ti.
anya-e0103n3:19_3: Abhibhavo cassā itarakilesehi adhikatāya anabhibhūtassa taṇhāyāti adhikārato veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:19_4: Tathā avijjā paññāya ujupaṭipakkhāti tadabhibhūtassa dandhābhiññatā vuttā. Akatādhikāroti
anya-e0103n3:19_5: bhavantare akataparicayo yathā paguṇaṁ katvā vissaṭṭhagantho appamattakena payogena
anya-e0103n3:19_6: suppavatti vācuggatova hoti, evaṁ pubbe kataparicayassa bhāvanā appakasireneva ijjhatīti
anya-e0103n3:19_7: āha “katādhikārassa sukhā”ti. Svāyaṁ akato, kato ca adhikāro samathanissito paṭipadāyaṁ
anya-e0103n3:19_8: vutto samādhippadhānattā paṭipadāya. Vipassanānissito abhiññāyaṁ ñāṇappadhānattā
anya-e0103n3:19_9: appanāya. Kilesindriyavasenāti tikkhātikkhānaṁ kilesindriyānaṁ vasena. Tenāha “tibbakilesassā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n3:20_1: dassetuṁ “yo puggalo”tiādi vuttaṁ. Appaguṇoti na subhāvito vasībhāvaṁ apāpito. Tenāha
anya-e0103n3:20_2: “uparijhānassa paccayo bhavituṁ na sakkotī”ti. Ayaṁ parittoti ayaṁ samādhi appānubhāvatāya
anya-e0103n3:20_3: paritto. Avaḍḍhiteti ekaṅguladvaṅgulamattampi na vaḍḍhite yathāupaṭṭhite ārammaṇe.
anya-e0103n3:20_4: Ekaṅgulamattampi hi vaḍḍhitaṁ appamāṇamevāti vadanti. “Paguṇo subhāvito”ti vatvā
anya-e0103n3:20_5: “uparijhānassa paccayo bhavituṁ sakkotī”ti iminā yathā paguṇopi uparijhānassa paccayo
anya-e0103n3:20_6: bhavituṁ asakkonto samādhi parittoyeva hoti, na appamāṇo, evaṁ ñāṇuttarassa ekāsaneneva
anya-e0103n3:20_8: “appamāṇo”tveva vuccati. Apare pana sace subhāvito paguṇo vasībhāvaṁ patto uparijhānassa
anya-e0103n3:20_9: paccayo ahontopi appamāṇo eva, pamāṇakarānaṁ rāgādipaṭipakkhānaṁ suvidūrabhāvatoti
anya-e0103n3:20_10: vadanti. Vuttalakkhaṇavomissatāyāti yo appaguṇo uparijhānassa paccayo bhavituṁ na
anya-e0103n3:20_11: sakkoti, vaḍḍhite ārammaṇe pavatto, ayaṁ paritto appamāṇārammaṇo. Yo pana paguṇo
anya-e0103n3:20_12: uparijhānassa paccayo bhavituṁ sakkoti, avaḍḍhite ārammaṇe pavatto, ayaṁ appamāṇo
anya-e0103n3:21_0: Tatoti tato paṭhamajjhānato uddhaṁ. Virattapītikanti atikkantapītikaṁ vā jigucchitapītikaṁ
anya-e0103n3:21_1: vā. Avayavo samudāyassa aṅganti vuccati, “senaṅgaṁ rathaṅga”ntiādīsu viyāti āha “catunnaṁ
anya-e0103n3:22_0: Hānaṁ bhajatīti hānabhāgiyo, hānabhāgo vā etassa atthīti hānabhāgiyo, parihānakoṭṭhāsikoti
anya-e0103n3:22_1: attho. Ālayassa apekkhāya apariccajanato ṭhitiṁ bhajatīti ṭhitibhāgiyo. Visesaṁ bhajatīti
anya-e0103n3:22_2: visesabhāgiyo. Paccanīkasamudācāravasenāti tassa tassa jhānassa paccanīkānaṁ nīvaraṇavitakkavicārādīnaṁ
anya-e0103n3:22_3: pavattivasena. Tadanudhammatāyāti tadanurūpabhūtāya satiyā. Saṇṭhānavasenāti saṇṭhahanavasena
anya-e0103n3:22_5: vā micchāsatī”ti sammohavinodaniyaṁ vuttaṁ. Tattha sāpekkhassa upari visesaṁ nibbattetuṁ
anya-e0103n3:22_6: asakkuṇeyyattā avigatanikantikā taṁtaṁpariharaṇasatītipi vattuṁ vaṭṭati. Evañca katvā
anya-e0103n3:22_7: “satiyā vā nikantiyā vā”ti vikappavacanañca yuttaṁ hoti. Visesādhigamavasenāti visesādhigamassa
anya-e0103n3:22_8: paccayabhāvavasena, visesaṁ vā adhigacchati etenāti visesādhigamo, tassa vasena.
anya-e0103n3:22_10: ca ābhogassa ca pavattivasena. Nibbedhabhāgiyatāti saccānaṁ nibbijjhanapakkhikatā
anya-e0103n3:23_0: Kāmasahagatāti kāmārammaṇā, kāmasaññāhi vā vokiṇṇā. Avitakkasahagatāti “kathaṁ nu
anya-e0103n3:23_1: kho me avitakkaṁ jhānaṁ bhaveyyā”ti evaṁ avitakkārammaṇā avitakkavisayā. Kāmañcāyaṁ
anya-e0103n3:23_2: “paṭhamassa jhānassā”tiādiko pāṭho paññāvasena āgato, samādhissāpi panettha saṅgaho
anya-e0103n3:23_3: atthevāti udāharaṇassa sātthakataṁ dassetuṁ “tāya pana paññāya sampayuttā samādhīpi
anya-e0103n3:23_4: cattāro hontī”ti tesaṁ vasena evaṁ vuttanti attho.
anya-e0103n3:24_0: Bhāvanāmayassa samādhissa idhādhippetattā upacārekaggatā “kāmāvacaro samādhī”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:24_1: Adhipatiṁ karitvāti “chandavato ce samādhi hoti, mayhampi evaṁ hotī”ti chandaṁ adhipatiṁ,
anya-e0103n3:24_2: chandaṁ dhuraṁ jeṭṭhakaṁ pubbaṅgamaṁ katvā. Labhati samādhinti evaṁ yaṁ samādhiṁ
anya-e0103n3:24_3: labhati, ayaṁ vuccati chandasamādhi, chandādhipatisamādhīti attho. Evaṁ vīriyasamādhiādayopi veditabbā.
anya-e0103n3:25_0: Catukkabhedeti catukkavasena samādhippabhedaniddese. Aññattha sampayogavasena vicārena
anya-e0103n3:25_1: saha vattamāno vitakko pañcakanaye dutiyajjhāne viyojitopi na suṭṭhu viyojitoti,
anya-e0103n3:25_2: tena saddhiṁyeva vicārasamatikkamaṁ dassetuṁ vuttaṁ “vitakkavicārātikkamena tatiya”nti.
anya-e0103n3:25_3: Dvidhā bhinditvā catukkabhede vuttaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānanti yojanā. Pañcajhānaṅgavasenāti
anya-e0103n3:25_4: pañcannaṁ jhānānaṁ aṅgabhāvavasena samādhissa pañcavidhatā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n3:26_1: ettha “saṁkilesa”ntiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha hānabhāgiyo dhammoti apaguṇehi paṭhamajjhānādīhi
anya-e0103n3:26_2: vuṭṭhitassa saññāmanasikārānaṁ kāmādianupakkhandanaṁ. Visesabhāgiyo dhammoti paguṇehi
anya-e0103n3:26_4: “paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhi”ntiādi. Tassattho – apaguṇassa paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhīnaṁ
anya-e0103n3:26_5: tato vuṭṭhitaṁ ārammaṇavasena kāmasahagatā hutvā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti codenti
anya-e0103n3:26_6: tudanti, tassa kāmānupakkhandānaṁ saññāmanasikārānaṁ vasena sā paṭhamajjhānapaññā
anya-e0103n3:26_7: hāyati, tasmā hānabhāginī paññā. Avitakkasahagatāti avitakkaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ santato
anya-e0103n3:26_8: paṇītato manasi karoto ārammaṇavasena avitakkasahagatā samudācaranti paguṇapaṭhamajjhānato
anya-e0103n3:26_9: vuṭṭhitaṁ dutiyajjhānādhigamatthāya codenti tudanti, tassa dutiyajjhānānupakkhandānaṁ
anya-e0103n3:26_10: saññāmanasikārānaṁ vasena paṭhamajjhānapaññā visesabhūtassa dutiyajjhānassa uppattiyā
anya-e0103n3:26_11: padaṭṭhānatāya visesabhāginī paññā. Taṁsampayutto samādhi idhādhippeto. Iminā nayenāti
anya-e0103n3:26_12: iminā paṭhamajjhāne vuttena vidhinā dutiyajjhānādīsupi hānabhāgiyadhammo, visesabhāgiyadhammo ca veditabbo.
anya-e0103n3:28_1: sappītikādiggahaṇena sādhāraṇato ca ariyamaggasampayutto samādhi vutto. Bhāvito hoti
anya-e0103n3:28_2: saññāya sampayuttattā. Tanti ariyamaggasamādhiṁ. Visunti paññābhāvanāya visuṁ katvā na vadāma.
anya-e0103n3:29_0: Kammaṭṭhānabhāvanaṁ paribundheti uparodheti pavattituṁ na detīti palibodho ra-kārassa
anya-e0103n3:29_1: la-kāraṁ katvā, paripanthoti attho. Upacchinditvāti samāpanena, saṅgahaṇena vā uparundhitvā,
anya-e0103n3:30_0: Āvasanti etthāti āvāso. Paricchedavasena veṇiyati dissatīti pariveṇaṁ. Vihāre bhikkhūnaṁ
anya-e0103n3:30_1: taṁ taṁ vasanaṭṭhānaṁ. Svāyaṁ āvāso. Navakammādīsūti ādi-saddena āvāsassa tadaññaṁ
anya-e0103n3:31_0: Tatrāti tasmiṁ palibodhābhāve. Pācīnakhaṇḍarājinti puratthimadisāyaṁ pabbatakhaṇḍānaṁ
anya-e0103n3:31_1: antare vanarājiṭṭhānaṁ. “Nāmā”ti iminā tassa padesassa ayaṁ samaññāti dasseti. Paṭisāmitamevāti
anya-e0103n3:31_2: niccakālaṁ paṭisāmetvāva vihārato nikkhamāmīti dasseti. Dhātunidhānaṭṭhānanti kāyabandhanadhammakaraṇanhānasāṭikaakkhakadhātusaṅkhātānaṁ
anya-e0103n3:31_3: paribhogasarīradhātūnaṁ nidahitaṭṭhānaṁ. Īdisassa ayaṁ thero viya alaggacittassa.
anya-e0103n3:31_4: Etena “bhikkhunā nāma āvāse evarūpena bhavitabba”nti ovādo dinno hoti. Ito paresupi
anya-e0103n3:32_0: Kulanti kulaggahaṇena kulamanussānaṁ gahaṇaṁ gāmaggahaṇena gāmavāsīnaṁ viya. Upaṭṭhākakulampīti
anya-e0103n3:32_1: pi-saddena pageva ñātikulanti dasseti. Uddesatthanti uddisāpanatthaṁ, pāṭhaṁ uddisāpetvā
anya-e0103n3:32_2: sajjhāyitunti attho. Idhevāti imasmiṁyeva padese, yattha katthaci vihāreti attho.
anya-e0103n3:33_0: Upagatoti vassaṁ upagato. Sadāti gatakālato pabhuti visesato pavāritadivasato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0103n3:33_1: sabbadā divase divase. Paridevamānāti taṁtaṁvilapanavasena vividhaṁ paridevantī.
anya-e0103n3:33_2: Sabbaṁ pavattinti attanā tattha diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya pacchā samāgamapariyosānaṁ
anya-e0103n3:34_0: Kāyasakkhinti “passa ima”nti mukhapaṭiggāhakaṁ katvā. Rathavinītapaṭipadanti dasakathāvatthukittanapubbikaṁ
anya-e0103n3:34_1: rathavinītūpamāhi vibhāvitaṁ rathavinītasutte āgataṁ sattavisuddhipaṭipadaṁ. Nālakapaṭipadanti
anya-e0103n3:34_2: “moneyyaṁ te upaññissa”ntiādinā satthārā nālakattherassa desitapaṭipadaṁ. Tuvaṭakapaṭipadanti
anya-e0103n3:34_3: “mūlaṁ papañcasaṅkhāyā”tiādinā bhagavatā desitapaṭipadaṁ. Tattha hi yathākkamaṁ –
anya-e0103n3:36: Ghāsesanaṁ chinnakatho, na vācaṁ payutaṁ bhaṇe”. ;
anya-e0103n3:37: “Gāme ca nābhisajjeyya, lābhakamyā janaṁ na lapayeyyā”ti. –
anya-e0103n3:38: Evamādikā paramappicchakathā āgatā. Catupaccayasantosabhāvanārāmatādīpakanti cīvarādīsu catūsu paccayesu santosassa, bhāvanārāmatāya ca pakāsakaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:39_0: Labbhatīti lābho. Tenāha “cattāro paccayā”ti. Mahāparivāreti vipulaparivāre. Piṇḍapātaṁ
anya-e0103n3:39_1: tāva dentā buddhapūjāpattacīvarādīni tassa parivārāni katvā denti, tathā cīvarādidānepi.
anya-e0103n3:39_2: Bāhullikapiṇḍapātikāti piṇḍapātikā hutvā paccayabāhullikā. Vadantīti purimadivase
anya-e0103n3:39_3: bhikkhāya āhiṇḍanakāle yathāsutaṁ vadanti. Niccabyāvaṭo upāsakādīnaṁ saṅgaṇhane.
anya-e0103n3:40_0: Tassāti gaṇassa. Soti gaṇapalibodho. Evanti idāni vuccamānākārena gaṇavācakassa pariyesanampi
anya-e0103n3:40_1: lahukameva icchitabbanti āha “yojanato paraṁ agantvā”ti. Attano kammanti samaṇadhammamāha.
anya-e0103n3:41_0: Katākateti kate ca akate ca kamme jānanavasena ussukkaṁ āpajjitabbaṁ, katākateti
anya-e0103n3:41_1: vā appake ca mahante ca kate, yathā “phalāphale”ti. Sace bahuṁ avasiṭṭhanti sambandho.
anya-e0103n3:42_0: Pabbajjāpekkhoti sīhaḷadīpe kira kuladārakānaṁ pabbajjā āvāhavivāhasadisā, tasmā
anya-e0103n3:42_1: taṁ paricchinnadivasaṁ atikkametuṁ na sakkā. “Sace taṁ alabhanto na sakkoti adhivāsetu”ntiādinā
anya-e0103n3:42_2: samāpanena palibodhupacchedo vutto, byatirekato pana “sace taṁ alabhanto sakkoti
anya-e0103n3:42_3: adhivāsetuṁ, araññaṁ pavisitvā samaṇadhammova kātabbo”ti ayamattho dassitoti saṅgahaṇena
anya-e0103n3:43: Tathāti yathā upajjhāyo gilāno yāvajīvaṁ upaṭṭhātabbo, tathā upasampāditaantevāsiko attano kammavācaṁ vatvā upasampādito.
anya-e0103n3:44: Yo koci rogoti mūlabhūto, anubandho vā attano uppanno. Anamataggeti anu anu amatagge anādimati.
anya-e0103n3:45_0: “Gantho”ti iminā ganthapalibodho idha vuttoti āha “pariyattiharaṇa”nti. Sajjhāyādīhīti
anya-e0103n3:45_1: sajjhāyadhāraṇaparicayapucchādīhi. Itarassāti abyāvaṭassa. Yassa ganthadhuraṁ vissajjetvā
anya-e0103n3:45_2: ṭhitassāpi gantho vattateva, na tassa gantho palibodho. Yathā tamhi tamhi vatthumhi
anya-e0103n3:45_3: āgatattherānaṁ, nāpi sabbena sabbaṁ aganthapasutassa. Majjhimapaṇṇāsako āgacchati,
anya-e0103n3:45_4: suttapadesānaṁ vārānañca sadisatāya byāmuyhanato. Puna na olokessāmīti kammaṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0103n3:46_0: Gāmavāsikattherehīti anurādhapuravāsīhi. Anuggahetvāti aggahetvā tattha paricayaṁ
anya-e0103n3:46_1: akatvā. Pañcanikāyamaṇḍaleti dīghāgamādike pañcapi nikāye sikkhitaparisāya. Parivattessāmīti
anya-e0103n3:46_2: vaṇṇayissāmi. Suvaṇṇabherinti seṭṭhabheriṁ. Katamācariyānaṁ uggahoti katamesaṁ ācariyānaṁ
anya-e0103n3:46_3: uggaho, kena parivattīyatīti adhippāyo. Ācariyamaggoti ācariyānaṁ kathāmaggo. Attano
anya-e0103n3:46_4: ācariyānanti attano kathetuṁ yuttānaṁ ācariyānaṁ. Suvinicchitā sabbā tipiṭakapariyatti
anya-e0103n3:46_5: etasmiṁ atthīti sabbapariyattiko, tepiṭakoti attho. Pīṭhe nisinno tato otaritvā bhūmiyaṁ
anya-e0103n3:46_6: taṭṭikāya nisīditvā. Gatakassāti paṭipattigamanena gatassa diṭṭhasaccassa. Cīvaraṁ
anya-e0103n3:46_7: pārupitvāti ācariyassa apacitidassanatthaṁ parimaṇḍalaṁ cīvaraṁ pārupitvā. Sāṭheyyābhāvato
anya-e0103n3:47_0: Pothujjanikāti puthujjane bhavā. Dupparihārā bahuparissayatāya. Tathā hissā uttānaseyyakadārako,
anya-e0103n3:47_1: taruṇasassañca nidassitaṁ. Vipassanāya palibodho samathayānikassa, na vipassanāyānikassa.
anya-e0103n3:47_2: Yebhuyyena hi jhānalābhī samathayānikova hoti vipassanāsukhato. Itarenāti samathatthikena.
anya-e0103n3:49_0: 42. Kammaṭṭhāne niyutto kammaṭṭhāniko, bhāvanamanuyuñjanto. Tena kammaṭṭhānikena.
anya-e0103n3:49_1: Paricchinditvāti “imasmiṁ vihāre sabbe bhikkhū”ti evaṁ paricchinditvā. Sahavāsīnaṁ
anya-e0103n3:49_2: bhikkhūnaṁ. Muducittatanti attani muducittataṁ janeti, ayañca sahavāsīnaṁ cittamaddavajananādiattho
anya-e0103n3:49_4: hoti sammāpaṭipattiyaṁ. Dibbānipi ārammaṇāni pageva itarāni. Sabbattha sabbasmiṁ
anya-e0103n3:49_5: samaṇakaraṇīye, sabbasmiṁ vā kammaṭṭhānānuyoge. Pubbāsevanavasena atthayitabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:49_6: Yogassa bhāvanāya anuyuñjanaṁ yogānuyogo, tadeva karaṇīyaṭṭhena kammaṁ, tassa yogānuyogakammassa
anya-e0103n3:50_0: Niccaṁ pariharitabbattāti sabbatthakakammaṭṭhānaṁ viya ekadāva ananuyuñjitvā sabbakālaṁ
anya-e0103n3:50_2: sampannaṁ. Kalyāṇamitto hi saddhāsampanno hoti sīlasampanno sutasampanno cāgasampanno
anya-e0103n3:50_3: vīriyasampanno satisampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno. Tattha saddhāsampattiyā
anya-e0103n3:50_4: saddahati tathāgatassa bodhiṁ, kammaphalañca, tena sammāsambodhiyā hetubhūtaṁ sattesu
anya-e0103n3:50_5: hitesitaṁ na pariccajati. Sīlasampattiyā sattānaṁ piyo hoti garu bhāvanīyo codako
anya-e0103n3:50_7: gambhīrānaṁ kathānaṁ kattā hoti, cāgasampattiyā appiccho hoti santuṭṭho pavivitto
anya-e0103n3:50_8: asaṁsaṭṭho, vīriyasampattiyā āraddhavīriyo hoti attahitaparahitapaṭipattiyaṁ, satisampattiyā
anya-e0103n3:50_9: upaṭṭhitassati hoti, samādhisampattiyā avikkhitto samāhitacitto, paññāsampattiyā
anya-e0103n3:50_10: aviparītaṁ pajānāti. So satiyā kusalākusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ gatiyo samannesamāno paññāya
anya-e0103n3:50_11: sattānaṁ hitāhitaṁ yathābhūtaṁ jānitvā samādhinā tattha ekaggacitto hutvā vīriyena
anya-e0103n3:50_12: satte ahitaṁ nisedhetvā hite niyojeti. Tena vuttaṁ “piyo…pe… niyojakoti evamādiguṇasamannāgata”nti.
anya-e0103n3:51_0: Taṁ pana kalyāṇamittaṁ paramukkaṁsagataṁ dassetuṁ “mamaṁ hī”tiādi vuttaṁ. Kārakabhāvaṁ
anya-e0103n3:51_1: yogakammassa. Pakāseti attānaṁ paṭipattiyā amoghabhāvadassanena samuttejanāya, sampahaṁsanāya
anya-e0103n3:51_2: ca, nanu kathesi paveṇipālanatthanti adhippāyo. Evarūpoti pesalo hutvā bahussuto.
anya-e0103n3:51_3: Tantidharoti suttadharo tattha kehicipi asaṁhīro. Vaṁsānurakkhakoti buddhānubuddhavaṁsassa
anya-e0103n3:51_4: anurakkhako. Paveṇipālakoti paveṇiyā ācariyuggahaṇassa anupālako. Ācariyamatikoti
anya-e0103n3:51_5: ācariyamatiyaṁ niyutto tassā anativattanato. Na attanomatiṁ pakāseti kathetīti na
anya-e0103n3:51_6: attanomatiko, attano matiṁ paggayha vattā na hotīti attho.
anya-e0103n3:52_1: dassanatthaṁ āraddhaṁ. Tattha pubbe vuttakhīṇāsavādayoti “yaṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetukāmo”tiādinā
anya-e0103n3:52_4: atthasaṁvaṇṇanāya ca visesato sodhitattā niggumbaṁ nijjaṭaṁ katvā gahitattā. Ito
anya-e0103n3:52_5: cito ca suttañca kāraṇañca sallakkhetvāti pañcasupi nikāyesu ito cito ca tassa tassa
anya-e0103n3:52_6: kammaṭṭhānassa anurūpaṁ suttapadañceva suttānugataṁ yuttiñca suṭṭhu upalakkhetvā.
anya-e0103n3:52_7: Sappāyāsappāyaṁ yojetvāti yassa kammaṭṭhānaṁ ācikkhati, tassa upakārānupakāraṁ yuttiṁ
anya-e0103n3:52_8: magganena yojetvā, samādāya vā sammadeva hadaye ṭhapetvāti attho. Mahāmaggaṁ dassentoti
anya-e0103n3:53_0: Sabbatthāti tattha tattha vihāre. Vattapaṭipattiṁ kurumānenāti paviṭṭhakāle āgantukavattaṁ,
anya-e0103n3:53_1: nikkhamanakāle gamikavattanti yathārahaṁ taṁ taṁ vattaṁ pūrentena. Sabbapārihāriyatelanti
anya-e0103n3:53_2: sabbesaṁ aṅgānaṁ, sabbesaṁ vā bhikkhūnaṁ atthāya pariharitabbatelaṁ. Ṭhapemīti anujānāpanaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:53_3: Yaṁ taṁ sammāvattaṁ paññattanti sambandho. Ekadivasaṁ sāyaṁ vissajjitenāpīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n3:55_0: 43. Santāne rāgassa ussannabhāvena caraṇaṁ pavatti rāgacariyā, sā sassatāsayādayo
anya-e0103n3:55_1: viya daṭṭhabbā. Tathā dosacariyādayo. Saṁsaggo sampayogārahavasena veditabbo, yathā
anya-e0103n3:55_3: “rāgadosacariyā rāgadosamohacariyā”tiādi. Imā eva hi sandhāya “aparāpi catasso”ti
anya-e0103n3:55_4: vuttaṁ. Tathāti yathā rāgādīnaṁ, tathā saddhādīnaṁ saṁsaggasannipātavasena saddhābuddhicariyā
anya-e0103n3:55_6: catasso. Evanti saṁsaggasannipātavasena. Saṁsagganti saṁsajjanaṁ missīkaraṇaṁ “rāgasaddhācariyā
anya-e0103n3:55_7: dosasaddhācariyā”tiādinā. Anekāti tesaṭṭhi, tato atirekāpi vā, tā pana asammohantena
anya-e0103n3:55_8: saṁyuttasuttaṭīkāyaṁ vitthārato dassitāti tattha vuttanayena veditabbā. “Pakatī”ti
anya-e0103n3:55_9: iminā asati paṭipakkhabhāvanāyaṁ tattha tattha santāne cariyāya sabhāvabhūtataṁ dasseti.
anya-e0103n3:55_10: Ussannatā aññadhammehi rāgādīnaṁ adhikatā, yato rāgacariyādīnaṁ paccayasamavāye rāgādayo
anya-e0103n3:55_11: balavanto honti, abhiṇhañca pavattanti. Tāsaṁ vasenāti channaṁ mūlacariyānaṁ vasena
anya-e0103n3:55_12: chaḷeva puggalā honti. Aññathā anekapuggalā siyuṁ, tathā ca sati adhippetatthasiddhi
anya-e0103n3:56_0: Saddhā balavatī hoti rāgussanne santāne tadanuguṇassa dhammassa niyogato adhikabhāvasambhavato.
anya-e0103n3:56_2: attho. Sabhāgo hi dūrepi āsanneyevāti sabhāgatālakkhaṇamidha āsannaggahaṇaṁ. Tattha
anya-e0103n3:56_3: saddhāya siniyhanaṁ pasādavasena akālussiyaṁ alūkhatā, rāgassa pana rañjanavasena.
anya-e0103n3:56_4: Saddhāya pariyesanaṁ adhimuccanavasena tanninnatā, rāgassa taṇhāyanavasena. Saddhāya
anya-e0103n3:56_5: apariccajanaṁ okappanavasena anupakkhandanaṁ, rāgassa abhisaṅgavasenāti evaṁ bhinnasabhāvānampi
anya-e0103n3:56_6: tesaṁ yathā alūkhatādisāmaññena sabhāgatā, evaṁ taṁsamaṅgīnampi puggalānanti āha
anya-e0103n3:57_0: Paññā balavatī hoti dosussanne santāne tadanuguṇassa dhammassa niyogato adhikabhāvasambhavato.
anya-e0103n3:57_2: attho. Tattha paññāya ārammaṇassa anallīyanaṁ tassa yathāsabhāvāvabodhavasena visaṁsaṭṭhatā,
anya-e0103n3:57_3: dosassa pana byāpajjanavasena. Paññāya pariyesanaṁ yathābhūtadosapavicayo, dosassa
anya-e0103n3:57_4: abhūtadosanijigīsā. Paññāya parivajjanaṁ nibbindanādivasena ñāṇutrāso, dosassa ahitādhānavasena
anya-e0103n3:57_5: chaḍḍananti evaṁ bhinnasabhāvānampi tesaṁ yathā anallīyanādisāmaññena sabhāgatā,
anya-e0103n3:57_6: evaṁ taṁsamaṅgīnampi puggalānanti āha “dosacaritassa buddhicarito sabhāgo”ti.
anya-e0103n3:58_0: Antarāyakarā vitakkāti micchāvitakkā micchāsaṅkappā uppajjanti mohussanne santāne
anya-e0103n3:58_1: tadanuguṇassa dhammassa yebhuyyena pavattisabbhāvato. Tenāha “mohassa āsannalakkhaṇattā”ti,
anya-e0103n3:58_2: anavaṭṭhānacañcalabhāvehi sabhāgadhammattāti attho. Tattha vitakkassa anavaṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0103n3:58_3: parikappavasena savipphāratāya, mohassa sammūḷhatāvasena byākulatāya. Tathā vitakkassa
anya-e0103n3:58_4: lahuparivitakkanena tadaṅgacalatāya cañcalatā, mohassa anogāḷhatāyāti evaṁ bhinnasabhāvānampi
anya-e0103n3:58_5: tesaṁ yathā anavaṭṭhānādisāmaññena sabhāgatā, evaṁ taṁsamaṅgīnampi puggalānanti āha
anya-e0103n3:59_0: Taṇhā rāgoyeva sabhāvato, tasmā rāgacariyāvinimuttā taṇhācariyā natthīti attho. Taṁsampayuttoti
anya-e0103n3:59_1: tena rāgena sampayutto, dosādayo viya tena vippayutto natthīti adhippāyo. Tadubhayanti
anya-e0103n3:59_2: taṇhāmānadvayaṁ. Nātivattatīti sabhāvato, sampayogavasena ca na atikkamitvā vaṭṭati.
anya-e0103n3:59_3: Kāmañcettha yathā rāgadosehi sampayogavasena saha vattamānassapi mohassa ussannatāvasena
anya-e0103n3:59_4: visuṁ cariyābhāvo, na kevalaṁ mohasseva, tathā saddhābuddhivitakkānaṁ. Evaṁ rāgena
anya-e0103n3:59_5: satipi sampayoge mānassāpi visuṁ cariyābhāvo yutto siyā, evaṁ santepi rāgapaṭighamānadiṭṭhivicikicchāvijjānaṁ
anya-e0103n3:59_6: viya anusayaṭṭho imesaṁ rāgādīnaṁyeva āveṇiko cariyaṭṭhoti, nattheva mānacariyā.
anya-e0103n3:59_7: Yato cariyā “pakatī”ti vuttā. Pakati ca sabhāvoti. Eteneva diṭṭhiyāpi visuṁ cariyābhāvābhāvo
anya-e0103n3:59_8: saṁvaṇṇitoti daṭṭhabbo. Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana mohacariyantogadhāva diṭṭhicariyāti dassetuṁ
anya-e0103n3:59_9: “mohanidānattā cā”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha ca-saddena sampayogaṁ samuccinoti mohanidānattā,
anya-e0103n3:60_0: 44.Kiṁ sappāyanti kīdisaṁ senāsanādisappāyaṁ. Pubbāciṇṇaṁ purimajātīsu ācaritaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:60_1: Ekacceti upatissattheraṁ sandhāyāha. Tena hi vimuttimagge tathā vuttaṁ. Pubbe kirāti
anya-e0103n3:60_2: kira-saddo arucisūcanattho. Iṭṭhappayogo manāpakiriyā. Subhakammabahulo yebhuyyena
anya-e0103n3:60_3: sobhanakammakārī. Na sabbe rāgacaritā eva honti, aluddhānampi pubbe iṭṭhappayogasubhakammabahulatāsambhavato,
anya-e0103n3:60_4: saggā cavitvā idhūpapattisambhavato ca. Etena asati pubbahetuniyāme yathāvuttakāraṇamattena
anya-e0103n3:60_5: na tesaṁ luddhatā, luddhabhāvahetukā ca rāgacariyāti imamatthaṁ dasseti.
anya-e0103n3:61_0: Itareti chedanādikammabahulā nirayādito idhūpapannā ca na sabbe dosamohacaritā eva
anya-e0103n3:61_1: hontīti yojanā. Idhāpi yathāvuttakāraṇassa kodhanabhāve, mūḷhabhāve ca anekantikattā
anya-e0103n3:61_2: dosamohacaritatāyapi anekaṁsikatā veditabbā. Dhātūnaṁ ussadaniyamo yadi pamāṇato,
anya-e0103n3:61_3: so natthi, atha sāmatthiyato, sopi ekaṁsiko na upalabbhatīti dassento āha “yathāvutteneva
anya-e0103n3:61_4: nayena ussadaniyamo nāma natthī”ti. Tattha yathāvuttenevāti “dvinnaṁ pana dhātūna”ntiādinā
anya-e0103n3:61_5: vuttappakāreneva. Dosaniyameti semhādidosādhikatāya rāgādicarito hotīti dosavasena
anya-e0103n3:61_7: mohacarito”ti vatvā puna “vātādhiko rāgacarito”ti ca vuttattā tampi dosavasena niyamavacanaṁ
anya-e0103n3:61_8: pubbāparaviruddhameva. Aparicchinnavacananti paricchedakārikāya paññāya na paricchinditvā
anya-e0103n3:62_1: pavattalobhādihetuniyāmena. Niyāmoti ca tesaṁyeva lobhādīnaṁ paṭiniyato lubbhanādisabhāvo
anya-e0103n3:62_2: daṭṭhabbo. Lobho ussado etesanti lobhussadā, ussannalobhā, lobhādhikāti attho. Amohussadā
anya-e0103n3:62_3: cāti ettha ca-saddo sampiṇḍanattho. Tena ye ime lobhussadatādīnaṁ paccekaṁ vomissato
anya-e0103n3:62_4: ca cuddasa pabhedā icchitā, te anavasesato sampiṇḍeti yathāvuttesu chasveva tesaṁ
anya-e0103n3:63_0: Idāni taṁ nesaṁ lobhussadatādīnaṁ paccekaṁ vomissakatādiṁ vibhāgena dassetuṁ “yassa
anya-e0103n3:63_1: hī”tiādi āraddhaṁ. Kammāyūhanakkhaṇeti kammakaraṇavelāyaṁ. Lobho balavāti lobho tajjāya
anya-e0103n3:63_2: paccayasāmaggiyā sāmatthiyato adhiko hoti. Alobho mandoti tappaṭipakkho alobho dubbalo.
anya-e0103n3:63_3: Kathaṁ panete lobhālobhā aññamaññaṁ ujuvipaccanīkabhūtā ekakkhaṇe pavattantīti? Na
anya-e0103n3:63_4: kho panetaṁ evaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ “ekakkhaṇe pavattantī”ti. Nikantikkhaṇaṁ pana āyūhanapakkhiyameva
anya-e0103n3:63_5: katvā evaṁ vuttaṁ. Eseva nayo sesesupi. Pariyādātunti abhibhavituṁ na sakkoti. Yo
anya-e0103n3:63_6: hi “evaṁsundaraṁ evaṁvipulaṁ evaṁmahagghañca na sakkā dātu”ntiādinā amuttacāgatādivasena
anya-e0103n3:63_7: pavattāya cetanāya sampayutto alobho, so sammadeva lobhaṁ pariyādātuṁ na sakkoti.
anya-e0103n3:63_8: Dosamohānaṁ anuppattiyā, tādisapaccayalābhena ca adosāmohā balavanto. Tasmāti lobhādosāmohānaṁ
anya-e0103n3:63_9: balavabhāvato, alobhadosamohānañca dubbalabhāvatoti vuttameva kāraṇaṁ paccāmasati.
anya-e0103n3:63_10: Soti taṁsamaṅgīpuggalo. Tena kammenāti tena lobhādiupanissayavatā kusalakammunā.
anya-e0103n3:64_0: Purimanayenevāti pubbe vuttanayānusārena mandā alobhādosā lobhadose pariyādātuṁ na
anya-e0103n3:64_1: sakkonti, amoho pana balavā mohaṁ pariyādātuṁ sakkotīti evaṁ tattha tattha vāre yathārahaṁ
anya-e0103n3:64_2: atidesattho veditabbo. Duṭṭhoti kodhano. Dandhoti mandapañño. Sīlakoti sukhasīlo.
anya-e0103n3:65_1: ekakā, tayo dukā, eko tikoti lobhādiussadavasena akusalapakkheyeva satta vārā, tathā
anya-e0103n3:65_2: kusalapakkhe alobhādiussadavasenāti cuddasa vārā labbhanti. Tattha alobhadosāmohā,
anya-e0103n3:65_3: alobhādosamohā, alobhadosamohā balavantoti āgatehi kusalapakkhe tatiyadutiyapaṭhamavārehi
anya-e0103n3:65_4: dosussadamohussadadosamohussadavārā gahitā eva honti, tathā akusalapakkhe lobhādosamohā,
anya-e0103n3:65_5: lobhadosāmohā, lobhādosāmohā balavantoti āgatehi tatiyadutiyapaṭhamavārehi adosussadaamohussadaadosāmohussadavārā
anya-e0103n3:65_6: gahitā evāti akusalakusalapakkhesu tayo tayo vāre antogadhe katvā aṭṭheva vārā dassitā.
anya-e0103n3:65_7: Ye pana ubhayesaṁ missatāvasena lobhālobhussadavārādayo apare ekūnapaññāsa vārā dassetabbā,
anya-e0103n3:65_8: te alabbhanato eva na dassitā. Na hi ekasmiṁ santāne antarena avatthantaraṁ “lobho
anya-e0103n3:65_9: ca balavā, alobho cā”tiādi yujjatīti, paṭipakkhavasena vā hi etesaṁ balavadubbalabhāvo,
anya-e0103n3:65_10: sahajātadhammavasena vā. Tattha lobhassa tāva paṭipakkhavasena alobhena anadhibhūtatāya
anya-e0103n3:65_11: balavabhāvo, tathā dosamohānaṁ adosāmohehi. Alobhādīnaṁ pana lobhādiabhibhavanato,
anya-e0103n3:65_12: sabbesañca samānajātiyamabhibhuyya pavattivasena sahajātadhammato balavabhāvo. Tena
anya-e0103n3:65_13: vuttaṁ aṭṭhakathāyaṁ “lobho balavā alobho mando, adosāmohā balavanto dosamohā mandā”ti.
anya-e0103n3:65_14: So ca nesaṁ mandabalavabhāvo purimūpanissayato tathā āsayassa paribhāvitatāya veditabbo.
anya-e0103n3:66_0: Yo luddhoti vuttoti yo ussadakittane “luddho”ti vutto, ayaṁ idha cariyāvicāre “rāgacarito”ti
anya-e0103n3:66_1: veditabbo. Duṭṭhadandhāti “duṭṭho, dandho”ti ca vuttā yathākkamaṁ dosamohacaritā.
anya-e0103n3:66_2: Paññavāti sātisayaṁ sappañño. Yato saddhāvitakkesu vijjamānesupi buddhicaritoti vuccati.
anya-e0103n3:66_3: Alobhādosānaṁ balavabhāvo saddhūpanissayatāya vinā na hotīti āha “aluddhaaduṭṭhā
anya-e0103n3:67_0: Ayañca nayo sādhāraṇato vuttoti nibbattitapubbahetuniyāmavaseneva buddhicaritādikepi
anya-e0103n3:67_1: dassetuṁ “yathā vā”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha amohaparivārenāti amohaparikkhittena, upanissayato
anya-e0103n3:67_2: sampayogato ca paññāya abhisaṅkhatenāti attho. Sesapadattayepi eseva nayo. Lobhādinā
anya-e0103n3:67_4: Avirodho ca yugaggāhavasena appavattiyā veditabbo. Tathā hi saddhānusāridhammānusārigottāni
anya-e0103n3:67_5: aññamaññampi bhinnasabhāvāneva. Ekaṁsena ca missakacariyāpi sampaṭicchitabbā pubbahetuniyāmena
anya-e0103n3:67_6: cariyāsiddhito. Tathā ceva ussadakittanaṁ pavattaṁ yathārahaṁ lobhālobhādīnaṁ vipākassa
anya-e0103n3:68_0: “Gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte katamesaṁ aṭṭhannaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti?
anya-e0103n3:68_1: Kusalakammassa javanakkhaṇe tayo hetū kusalā tasmiṁ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā
anya-e0103n3:68_2: honti, tena vuccati kusalamūlapaccayāpi saṅkhārā. Nikantikkhaṇe dve hetū akusalā
anya-e0103n3:68_3: tasmiṁ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti, tena vuccati akusalamūlapaccayāpi
anya-e0103n3:68_4: saṅkhārā. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo hetū abyākatā tasmiṁ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā
anya-e0103n3:68_5: honti, tena vuccati nāmarūpapaccayāpi viññāṇaṁ, viññāṇapaccayāpi nāmarūpa”nti –
anya-e0103n3:69_0: Ādi. Pubbahetuniyāmena ca yathā tihetukassa paññāveyyattiyaṁ, na tathā duhetukassa.
anya-e0103n3:69_1: Yathā ca duhetukassa itikattabbatā nepakkaṁ, na tathā ahetukassa. Evaṁ lobhussadādayo
anya-e0103n3:69_2: puggalā rāgacaritādayo hontīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbanti. Yathāvuttamatthaṁ nigamavasena
anya-e0103n3:70_0: 45.Tatrāti tasmiṁ pucchāvacane. Nayoti jānananayo. Puggalādhiṭṭhānena vuttopi attho
anya-e0103n3:70_2: akittimena sabhāvagamanena. Cāturiyenāti cāturabhāvena siṅgārena. Ukkuṭikanti asamphuṭṭhamajjhaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:70_3: Khaṇanto viyāti bhūmiṁ khaṇanto viya. Anukaḍḍhitanti pādanikkhepasamaye kaḍḍhanto
anya-e0103n3:70_4: viya pādaṁ nikkhipati. Tenassa padaṁ anukaḍḍhitaṁ pacchato añchitaṁ hoti. Paribyākulāyāti
anya-e0103n3:70_5: parito āluḷitāya. Chambhito viyāti vitthāyanto viya. Bhīto viyāti keci. Sahasānupīḷitanti
anya-e0103n3:70_6: aggapādena, paṇhiyā ca sahasāva sannirujjhitaṁ. Vivaṭṭacchadassāti vinivaṭṭacchadanassa
anya-e0103n3:70_7: pahīnakilesassa. Idamīdisaṁ padanti bhagavato padaṁ disvā vadati.
anya-e0103n3:71_0: Pāsādikanti pasādāvahaṁ. Madhurākāranti iṭṭhākāraṁ. Thaddhākāranti thambhitākāraṁ.
anya-e0103n3:71_1: Ataramānoti nataramāno, saṇikanti attho. Samodhāyāti sammadeva odhāya avikkhipitvā.
anya-e0103n3:71_2: Nipajjitvāti kāyapasāraṇalakkhaṇāya nipajjāya seyyāya nipajjitvā sayati niddāyati.
anya-e0103n3:71_3: Pakkhittakāyoti avakkhittakāyo avaso viya sahasā patitakāyo. Dussaṇṭhānanti virūpasannivesaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:73_0: Nipuṇamadhurasamasakkaccakārīti sukosallaṁ sundaraṁ avisamaṁ sābhisaṅkhārañca karaṇasīlo.
anya-e0103n3:73_1: Gāḷhathaddhavisamakārīti thiraṁ asithilaṁ visamañca karaṇasīlo. Aparicchinnaṁ apariniṭṭhitaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:74: Mukhapūrakanti mukhassa pūraṇaṁ mahantaṁ. Arasapaṭisaṁvedīti narasapaṭisaṁvedī. Bhājane chaḍḍentoti bhojanabhājane sitthāni chaḍḍento. Mukhaṁ makkhentoti bahimukhaṁ makkhento.
anya-e0103n3:75: Kilantarūpoviyāti tassa asahanena khedappatto viya. Aññāṇupekkhāyāti aññāṇabhūtāya upekkhāya. Aññāṇasaṅkhātāya upekkhāyāti keci.
anya-e0103n3:76_3: Sakalābhena asantussanalakkhaṇā asantuṭṭhitā. Vijjhanaṭṭhena siṅgaṁ, siṅgāratānāgarikabhāvasaṅkhātaṁ
anya-e0103n3:76_4: kilesasiṅgaṁ. Attano sarīrassa, cīvarādiparikkhārassa ca maṇḍanavasena pavattaṁ loluppaṁ
anya-e0103n3:76_5: cāpalyaṁ. Evamādayoti ettha ādi-saddena ahirikānottappamadappamādādayo saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0103n3:77_0: Parāparādhassa upanayhanalakkhaṇo upanāho. Paresaṁ guṇamakkhaṇalakkhaṇo makkho. Parassa
anya-e0103n3:77_1: guṇe ḍaṁsitvā apanento viya yugaggāhalakkhaṇo paḷāso. Parasampattiusūyanalakkhaṇā
anya-e0103n3:77_2: issā. Attasampattinigūhanalakkhaṇaṁ macchariyaṁ. Idha ādi-saddena dovacassatāpāpamittatādīnaṁ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n3:78_0: Anussāhanaṁ thinaṁ. Asattivighāto middhaṁ. Cetaso avūpasamo uddhaccaṁ. Vippaṭisāro
anya-e0103n3:78_1: kukkuccaṁ. Saṁsayo vicikicchā. Ayoniso daḷhaggāho ādhānaggāhitā. Yathāgahitassa micchāgāhassa
anya-e0103n3:78_2: dubbiveṭhiyatā duppaṭinissaggiyatā. Idha ādi-saddena muṭṭhasaccaasampajaññādīnaṁ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n3:79: Muttacāgatāti vissaṭṭhacāgatā nissaṅgapariccāgo. Yathā māyādayo, tathā pavattā akusalakkhandhā, yathā ariyānaṁ dassanakāmatādayo, tathā pavattā kusalakkhandhā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n3:80_0: Pasādanīyaṭṭhānaṁ nāma vatthuttayaṁ. Saṁvejanīyaṭṭhānāni jātiādīni. Kusalānuyogeti
anya-e0103n3:80_1: kusaladhammabhāvanāyaṁ. “Evañca evañca karissāmī”ti kiccānaṁ rattibhāge parivitakkanaṁ
anya-e0103n3:80_2: rattiṁ dhūmāyanā. Tathāvitakkitānaṁ tesaṁ divasabhāge anuṭṭhānaṁ divā pajjalanā.
anya-e0103n3:80_3: Hurāhuraṁ dhāvanāti ito cito ca tattha tattha ārammaṇe cittavosaggo. Tenevāha “idaṁ
anya-e0103n3:80_4: pure cittamacāri cārikaṁ, yenicchakaṁ yatthakāmaṁ yathāsukha”nti, “cittamassa vidhāvatī”ti ca.
anya-e0103n3:81_0: Dhammappavattidassanādi ca pāḷiyaṁ, aṭṭhakathāyañca anāgatamevāti na sakkā vattunti
anya-e0103n3:81_1: “sabbākārenā”ti vuttaṁ. Kiñci kiñci āgatampi atthevāti hi adhippāyo. “Na sārato paccetabba”nti
anya-e0103n3:81_2: vatvā tattha kāraṇaṁ dassento “rāgacaritassa hī”tiādimāha. Appamādavihārinoti tattha
anya-e0103n3:81_3: vinidhāya bhāvaṁ paṭipajjanena appamādakārino. Bhinnalakkhaṇā iriyāpathādayoti cāturiyena
anya-e0103n3:81_4: acāturiyena saṇikaṁ, sahasā ca gamanādayo. Na upapajjantīti na yujjanti. Pucchitvā
anya-e0103n3:82_1: Bhūmaṭṭhakanti bhūmitaleyeva uṭṭhāpitaṁ uparimatalarahitaṁ. Ekato onatassa pabbatapādassa
anya-e0103n3:82_3: olambamānamukhāhi khuddakavaggulīhi paripuṇṇaṁ. Oluggavilugganti chinnabhinnaṁ. Ujjaṅgalaṁ
anya-e0103n3:82_4: lūkhadhūsaraṁ chāyūdakarahitaṁ. Sīhabyagghādibhayena sāsaṅkaṁ. Durūpanti virūpaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:82_5: Dubbaṇṇanti asundaravaṇṇaṁ, dussaṇṭhānaṁ vā. Jālākārena katapūvaṁ jālapūvaṁ. Sāṇi
anya-e0103n3:82_6: viya kharasamphassanti sāṇiphalako viya dukkhasamphassaṁ. Bhārikabhāvena, antarantarā
anya-e0103n3:82_7: tunnakaraṇena ca kicchapariharaṇaṁ. Āṇigaṇṭhikāhatoti āṇinā, gaṇṭhiyā ca hatasobho.
anya-e0103n3:82_8: Idaṁ rāgacaritassa sappāyaṁ, evamassa kilesasamudācāro na hotīti adhippāyo. Eseva nayo sesesupi.
anya-e0103n3:83_0: Disāmukhanti disābhimukhaṁ, abbhokāsābhimukhanti adhippāyo. Mahākasiṇanti mahantaṁ
anya-e0103n3:83_1: kasiṇamaṇḍalaṁ. Sesaṁ senāsanādīsu yaṁ vattabbaṁ mohacaritassa, taṁ dosacaritassa vuttasadisameva.
anya-e0103n3:84: Vitakkavidhāvanasseva paccayo hoti yathā taṁ āyasmato meghiyattherassa. Darīmukheti pabbatavivare. Parittanti suppasarāvamattaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:85_1: paccekaṁ pariccheda-saddo yojetabbo. Vibhāvanāti “ayaṁ rāgacarito”tiādinā jānanavibhāvanā.
anya-e0103n3:85_2: Ekaccakasiṇānussatiṭṭhānamattassa pasaṅgena kathitattā vuttaṁ “na ca tāva cariyānukūlaṁ
anya-e0103n3:87_1: niddesato. “Ettha ettakāni upacārajjhānāvahāni, ettakāni appanājjhānāvahānī”ti upacārappanāvahato.
anya-e0103n3:87_3: jhānappabhedato. “Etesu aṅgasamatikkamo, etesu ārammaṇasamatikkamo”ti evaṁ samatikkamato.
anya-e0103n3:87_4: “Ettakānettha vaḍḍhetabbāni, ettakāni na vaḍḍhetabbānī”ti vaḍḍhanāvaḍḍhanato. Ārammaṇatoti
anya-e0103n3:87_7: āruppādīnaṁ yathārahaṁ paccayabhāvato. Cariyānukūlatoti rāgacariyādīnaṁ anukūlabhāvato.
anya-e0103n3:88_0: Kammaṭṭhānānīti ārammaṇabhāvena yogakammassa pavattiṭṭhānāni. Catukkajjhānikāti catubbidharūpāvacarajjhānavanto,
anya-e0103n3:88_1: tesaṁ ārammaṇabhūtāti attho. Catukkanayavasena cetaṁ vuttaṁ. Tikacatukkajjhānikesūti
anya-e0103n3:88_2: tikajjhānikesu purimesu brahmavihāresu, catukkajjhānikesu ānāpānakasiṇesu. Sesesūti
anya-e0103n3:89_0: Dibbacakkhunā diṭṭhahadayarūpassa sattassa cittaṁ ādikammiko cetopariyañāṇena paricchindituṁ
anya-e0103n3:89_1: sakkoti, na itarassāti kasiṇapharaṇaṁ cetopariyañāṇassa paccayo hoti. Tena vuttaṁ
anya-e0103n3:89_2: “parasattānañca cetasā cittamaññātuṁ samattho hotī”ti. Okāsena paricchinnattāti attano
anya-e0103n3:89_3: ṭhitokāsena paricchinnattā. Tathā uggahakosallassa sampāditattā paricchinnākāreneva
anya-e0103n3:89_4: tāni upatiṭṭhanti, tasmā na tattha vaḍḍhanāti adhippāyo. Sace pana koci vaḍḍheyya,
anya-e0103n3:89_5: na tena koci guṇoti dassento āha “ānisaṁsābhāvā cā”ti. “Tesu panā”tiādinā tameva
anya-e0103n3:89_6: ānisaṁsābhāvaṁ vivarati. Yasmā vaḍḍhitesu kuṇaparāsiyeva vaḍḍhati, avaḍḍhitepi kāmarāgavikkhambhanā
anya-e0103n3:89_7: hotiyeva, tasmā ānisaṁsābhāvo. Vibhūtāti vipulārammaṇatāya supākaṭā, vaḍḍhitanimittatāya
anya-e0103n3:90_0: Kevalanti sakalaṁ anavasesaṁ. “Pathaviṁ ima”nti vacanaṁ upaṭṭhānākārena vuttaṁ, na
anya-e0103n3:90_1: nimittassa vaḍḍhanenāti adhippāyo. Lābhittāti sātisayaṁ lābhitāya, ukkaṁsagatavasibhāvatoti
anya-e0103n3:90_2: attho. Thero hi paramāya vasipattiyā assamaṇḍale assaṁ sārento viya yattha tattha
anya-e0103n3:90_3: nisinnopi ṭhitopi taṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjateva. Tenassa samantato nimittaṁ vaḍḍhitaṁ
anya-e0103n3:91_0: Vuttāti dhammasaṅgahe vuttā. Mahanteti vipule. Ninnathalādivasena hi ekadese aṭṭhatvā
anya-e0103n3:91_1: samantato gahaṇavasena sakalasarīre nimittaṁ gaṇhantassa taṁ mahantaṁ hoti. Mahante
anya-e0103n3:91_2: vā sarīre. Appaketi sarīrassa ekadese nimittaṁ gaṇhātīti yojanā. Appake vā khuddake
anya-e0103n3:91_3: dārakasarīre. Etanti asubhanimittaṁ. Ādīnavanti “asubharāsi eva vaḍḍhati, na ca koci
anya-e0103n3:92_0: Sesānipi na vaḍḍhetabbānīti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṁ upapattito vivarituṁ “kasmā”tiādi
anya-e0103n3:92_1: vuttaṁ. Picupiṇḍādivasena upaṭṭhahantampi nimittaṁ vātasaṅghātasannissayanti katvā
anya-e0103n3:92_3: saparicchedaṁ. Vāyokasiṇavaḍḍhane viya na ettha koci guṇo, kevalaṁ vātavaḍḍhanamevāti
anya-e0103n3:92_4: āha “sādīnavattā”ti. Tesanti brahmavihārānaṁ. Nimittanti ārammaṇaṁ. Na ca tena attho
anya-e0103n3:92_5: atthīti tena sattarāsivaḍḍhanena pathavīkasiṇādivaḍḍhane viya kiñci payojanaṁ natthi.
anya-e0103n3:92_6: Pariggahavasenāti apariggahitassa bhāvanāvisayassa pariggahavasena, na nimittavaḍḍhanavasena.
anya-e0103n3:92_8: paṭibhāganimittaṁ ayaṁ yogī. Sīmāsambhedeneva hettha upacārajjhānuppatti, na nimittuppattiyā.
anya-e0103n3:92_9: Yadi evaṁ kathaṁ parittādiārammaṇatā jhānassāti āha “parittaappamāṇārammaṇatāpettha
anya-e0103n3:92_10: pariggahavasenā”ti, katipaye satte pariggahetvā pavattā mettādayo parittārammaṇā,
anya-e0103n3:92_11: bahuke appamāṇārammaṇāti attho. Ākāsaṁ kasiṇugghāṭimattā na vaḍḍhetabbanti yojanā.
anya-e0103n3:92_12: Vakkhati vā yaṁ tena sambandhitabbaṁ. Parikappajameva ārammaṇaṁ vaḍḍhetuṁ sakkā,
anya-e0103n3:92_13: na itaranti āha “na hi sakkā sabhāvadhammaṁvaḍḍhetu”nti. Āruppānaṁ parittaappamāṇārammaṇatā
anya-e0103n3:92_14: parittakasiṇugghāṭimākāse, vipulakasiṇugghāṭimākāse ca pavattiyā veditabbā. Sesāni
anya-e0103n3:93_1: Sesāni chāti cattāro brahmavihārā, ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ, ākiñcaññāyatananti imāni sesāni
anya-e0103n3:93_2: cha. Vissandamānapubbatāya vipubbakaṁ. Paggharamānalohitatāya lohitakaṁ. Kimīnaṁ
anya-e0103n3:93_3: pacalanena puḷuvakaṁ, calitārammaṇaṁ vuttaṁ. Vātapānavivarādīhi antopaviṭṭhassa sūriyālokādikassa
anya-e0103n3:93_4: calanākāro paññāyatīti obhāsamaṇḍalārammaṇampi calitārammaṇaṁ vuttaṁ. Pubbabhāgeti
anya-e0103n3:94: Devesūti kāmāvacaradevesu, tattha asubhānaṁ paṭikūlassa ca āhārassa abhāvato. Assāsapassāsānaṁ brahmaloke abhāvato “ānāpānassati cā”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:95_0: Diṭṭhenāti diṭṭhena vatthunā kāraṇabhūtena. Gahetabbānīti uggahetabbāni, uppādetabbauggahanimittānīti
anya-e0103n3:95_1: attho. Tenāha “pubbabhāge”tiādi. Tassāti kāyagatāsatiyā. Ucchusassādīnaṁ pattesu
anya-e0103n3:95_2: pacalamānavaṇṇaggahaṇamukhena vā tassa gahetabbattā vuttaṁ “vāyokasiṇaṁ diṭṭhaphuṭṭhenā”ti.
anya-e0103n3:95_3: Na ādikammikena gahetabbānīti ādikammikena na gahetabbāni, bhāvanārambhavasena na
anya-e0103n3:95_4: paṭṭhapetabbāni, heṭṭhime tayo brahmavihāre, kasiṇesu rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānañca
anya-e0103n3:96: Imesu pana kammaṭṭhānesūti ettha kammaṭṭhānaggahaṇena yathārahaṁ ārammaṇānaṁ, jhānānañca gahaṇaṁ veditabbaṁ. Sukhavihārassāti diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārassa.
anya-e0103n3:97_0: “Ekādasa kammaṭṭhānāni anukūlānī”ti ujuvipaccanīkavasena cetaṁ vuttaṁ. Evaṁ sesesupi.
anya-e0103n3:97_1: Vakkhati hi “sabbañceta”ntiādi. Anukūlāni rāgavikkhambhanassa upāyabhāvato. Aṭṭha
anya-e0103n3:97_2: anukūlānīti yojanā. Evaṁ sesesu. Ekanti idaṁ anussatiapekkhaṁ anussatīsu ekanti,
anya-e0103n3:97_3: na mohacaritavitakkacaritāpekkhaṁ tesaṁ aññassāpi anukūlassa alabbhanato. “Saddhācaritassapurimā
anya-e0103n3:97_4: cha anussatiyo”ti idaṁ atisappāyavasena vuttaṁ. Imasseva ujuvipaccanīkaṁ imassa atisappāyanti
anya-e0103n3:97_5: gahetabbassa visesassa abhāvato sabbacaritānaṁ anukūlāni. Parittanti sarāvamattaṁ,
anya-e0103n3:97_6: appamāṇanti tato adhikapamāṇaṁ. Parittaṁ vā suppasarāvamattaṁ, appamāṇaṁ adhikapamāṇaṁ
anya-e0103n3:98_0: Cattāro dhammāti cattāro manasikaraṇīyā dhammā. Uttarīti sīlasampadā, kalyāṇamittatā,
anya-e0103n3:98_1: sappāyadhammassavanaṁ, vīriyaṁ; paññāti imesu pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhānato upari.
anya-e0103n3:98_2: Asubhāti asubhabhāvanā ekādasasu asubhakammaṭṭhānesu bhāvanānuyogā. Mettāti anodhiso,
anya-e0103n3:98_3: odhiso vā pavattā mettābhāvanā. Ānāpānassatīti soḷasavatthukā ānāpānassatisamādhibhāvanā.
anya-e0103n3:98_5: aniccā”ti evaṁ pavattā aniccānupassanā. Asmimānasamugghātāyāti “asmī”ti uppajjanakassa
anya-e0103n3:98_6: navavidhassāpi mānassa samucchindanāya. Ettha hi ekasseva cattāro dhammā bhāvetabbā
anya-e0103n3:98_7: vuttā, na ekassa catucariyatāya. Tena viññāyati “sabbānipi kammaṭṭhānāni sabbākusalavikkhambhanāni
anya-e0103n3:99_0: Ekasseva satta kammaṭṭhānāni vuttāni, na cāyasmā rāhulo sabbacaritoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n3:99_2: Adhippāyoti tathāvacanassa adhippāyo. So pana “sabbañceta”ntiādinā vibhāvito eva.
anya-e0103n3:100_1: gahetvā”tiādinā vuttanayena upasaṅkamitvā. Somanassameva uppajjati “evaṁ bahuparissayoyaṁ
anya-e0103n3:100_2: attabhāvo ṭhāneyeva mayā niyyātito”ti. Tenāha “yathā hī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n3:101_0: Atajjanīyoti na tajjetabbo na niggahetabbo. Svāyaṁ atajjanīyabhāvo dovacassatāya
anya-e0103n3:101_1: vā siyā, ācariye aniviṭṭhapematāya vāti tadubhayaṁ dassetuṁ “dubbaco vā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:101_2: Yo hi ācariyena tajjiyamāno kopañca dosañca apaccayañca pātukaroti, yo vā “kimassa
anya-e0103n3:101_3: santike vāsenā”ti pakkamati, ayaṁ duvidhopi atajjanīyo. Dhammenāti ovādānusāsanidhammena.
anya-e0103n3:101_4: Gūḷhaṁ ganthanti kammaṭṭhānaganthaṁ, saccapaṭiccasamuppādādisahitaṁ gambhīraṁ suññatāpaṭisaṁyuttañca.
anya-e0103n3:102_0: Tumhākamatthāyāti vutteti “sataporise papāte patanena tumhākaṁ koci attho hotī”ti
anya-e0103n3:102_1: kenaci vutte. Ghaṁsentoti “manussakakkena tumhākaṁ koci attho”ti vutte ghaṁsento
anya-e0103n3:102_2: niravasesaṁ attabhāvaṁ khepetuṁ ussaheyyaṁ. “Mama assāsapassāsanirundhanena tumhākaṁ
anya-e0103n3:102_3: koci rogavūpasamādiko attho atthī”ti kenaci vutte. Tīhipi bhikkhūhi ācariye bhattipavedanamukhena
anya-e0103n3:103_0: 49. Aññattha pavattitvāpi cittaṁ āgamma yattha seti, so tassa āsayo “migāsayo” viya,
anya-e0103n3:103_1: āsayo eva ajjhāsayo. So duvidho vipanno, sampannoti. Tattha vipanno sassatādimicchābhinivesanissito.
anya-e0103n3:103_2: Sampanno duvidho vaṭṭanissito, vivaṭṭanissitoti. Tesu vivaṭṭanissito ajjhāsayo “sampannajjhāsayenā”ti
anya-e0103n3:103_3: idhādhippeto. Idāni naṁ vibhāgena dassetuṁ “alobhādīnaṁ vasenā”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha
anya-e0103n3:103_4: chahākārehīti alubbhanādīhi chahi ākārehi. Sampannajjhāsayenāti pubbabhāgiyānaṁ sīlasampadādīnaṁ
anya-e0103n3:103_5: sādhanavasena, lokuttarānaṁ upanissayabhāvena ca sampanno ajjhāsayo etassāti sampannajjhāsayo,
anya-e0103n3:103_6: tena. Alobhādayo hi anekadosavidhamanato, anekaguṇāvahato ca sattānaṁ bahukārā visesato
anya-e0103n3:103_7: yogino. Tathā hi alobhādayo maccheramalādīnaṁ paṭipakkhabhāvena pavattanti. Vuttaṁ hetaṁ –
anya-e0103n3:104_0: “Alobho maccheramalassa paṭipakkho, adoso dussīlyamalassa, amoho kusalesu dhammesu
anya-e0103n3:104_1: abhāvanāya. Alobho cettha dānahetu, adoso sīlahetu, amoho bhāvanāhetu. Tesu ca alobhena
anya-e0103n3:104_2: anadhikaṁ gaṇhāti luddhassa adhikaggahaṇato, adosena anūnaṁ duṭṭhassa ūnaggahaṇato,
anya-e0103n3:105_0: “Alobhena cettha vijjamānaṁ dosaṁ dosato dhārento dose pavattati, luddho hi dosaṁ
anya-e0103n3:105_1: paṭicchādeti. Adosena vijjamānaṁ guṇaṁ guṇato dhārento guṇe pavattati, duṭṭho hi
anya-e0103n3:105_2: guṇaṁ makkheti. Amohena yāthāvasabhāvaṁ yāthāvasabhāvato dhārento yāthāvasabhāve
anya-e0103n3:105_3: pavattati, mūḷho hi tacchaṁ ‘ataccha’nti, atacchañca ‘taccha’nti gaṇhāti. Alobhena
anya-e0103n3:105_4: ca piyavippayogadukkhaṁ na hoti luddhassa piyasabbhāvato, piyavippayogāsahanato ca,
anya-e0103n3:105_5: adosena appiyasampayogadukkhaṁ na hoti duṭṭhassa appiyasabbhāvato, appiyasampayogāsahanato
anya-e0103n3:105_6: ca, amohena icchitālābhadukkhaṁ na hoti, amūḷhassa hi ‘taṁ kutettha labbhā’ti evamādipaccavekkhaṇasabbhāvato.
anya-e0103n3:106_0: “Alobhena cettha jātidukkhaṁ na hoti alobhassa taṇhāpaṭipakkhato, taṇhāmūlakattā
anya-e0103n3:106_1: ca jātidukkhassa, adosena jarādukkhaṁ na hoti tikkhadosassa khippaṁ jarāsambhavato,
anya-e0103n3:106_2: amohena maraṇadukkhaṁ na hoti, sammohamaraṇañhi dukkhaṁ, na ca taṁ amūḷhassa hoti.
anya-e0103n3:106_3: Alobhena ca gahaṭṭhānaṁ, amohena pabbajitānaṁ, adosena pana sabbesampi sukhasaṁvāsatā hoti.
anya-e0103n3:107_0: “Visesato cettha alobhena pettivisaye upapatti na hoti, yebhuyyena hi sattā taṇhāya
anya-e0103n3:107_1: pettivisayaṁ upapajjanti, taṇhāya ca paṭipakkho alobho. Adosena niraye upapatti na
anya-e0103n3:107_2: hoti, dosena hi caṇḍajātitāya dosasadisaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjanti, dosassa ca paṭipakkho
anya-e0103n3:107_3: adoso. Amohena tiracchānayoniyaṁ nibbatti na hoti, mohena hi niccasammūḷhaṁ tiracchānayoniṁ
anya-e0103n3:107_4: upapajjanti, mohapaṭipakkho ca amoho. Etesu ca alobho rāgavasena upagamanassa abhāvakaro,
anya-e0103n3:107_5: adoso dosavasena apagamanassa, amoho mohavasena amajjhattabhāvassa.
anya-e0103n3:108_0: “Tīhipi cetehi yathāpaṭipāṭiyā nekkhammasaññā abyāpādasaññā avihiṁsāsaññāti imā tisso,
anya-e0103n3:108_1: asubhasaññā appamāṇasaññā dhātusaññāti imā ca tisso saññāyo honti. Alobhena pana
anya-e0103n3:108_3: amohena majjhimāya paṭipattiyā paṭipajjanaṁ. Tathā alobhena abhijjhākāyaganthassa
anya-e0103n3:108_4: pabhedanaṁ hoti, adosena byāpādakāyaganthassa, amohena sesaganthadvayassa. Purimāni
anya-e0103n3:108_5: ca dve satipaṭṭhānāni purimānaṁ dvinnaṁ ānubhāvena, pacchimāni pacchimasseva ānubhāvena ijjhanti.
anya-e0103n3:109_0: “Alobho cettha ārogyassa paccayo hoti, aluddho hi lobhanīyampi asappāyaṁ na sevati,
anya-e0103n3:109_1: tena arogo hoti. Adoso yobbanassa, aduṭṭho hi valitapalitāvahena dosagginā aḍayhamāno
anya-e0103n3:109_2: dīgharattaṁ yuvā hoti. Amoho dīghāyukatāya, amūḷho hi hitāhitaṁ ñatvā ahitaṁ parivajjento,
anya-e0103n3:110_0: “Alobho cettha bhogasampattiyā paccayo cāgena bhogapaṭilābhato, adoso mittasampattiyā
anya-e0103n3:110_1: mettāya mittānaṁ paṭilābhato, aparihānato ca, amoho attasampattiyā, amūḷho hi attano
anya-e0103n3:110_2: hitameva karonto attānaṁ sampādeti. Alobho ca dibbavihārassa paccayo hoti, adoso
anya-e0103n3:111_0: “Alobhena cettha sakapakkhesu sattasaṅkhāresu nibbuto hoti tesaṁ vināsena abhisaṅgahetukassa
anya-e0103n3:111_1: dukkhassa abhāvā, adosena parapakkhesu, aduṭṭhassa hi verīsupi verisaññāya abhāvato,
anya-e0103n3:112_0: “Alobhena ca aniccadassanaṁ hoti, luddho hi upabhogāsāya aniccepi saṅkhāre aniccato
anya-e0103n3:112_1: na passati. Adosena dukkhadassanaṁ, adosajjhāsayo hi pariccattaāghātavatthupariggaho
anya-e0103n3:112_2: saṅkhāreyeva dukkhato passati. Amohena anattadassanaṁ, amūḷho hi yāthāvagahaṇakusalo
anya-e0103n3:112_3: apariṇāyakaṁ khandhapañcakaṁ apariṇāyakato bujjhati. Yathā ca etehi aniccadassanādīni,
anya-e0103n3:112_4: evaṁ etepi aniccadassanādīhi honti. Aniccadassanena hi alobho hoti, dukkhadassanena
anya-e0103n3:112_5: adoso, anattadassanena amoho. Ko hi nāma ‘aniccamida’nti sammā ñatvā tassatthāya
anya-e0103n3:112_6: pihaṁ uppādeyya, saṅkhāre vā ‘dukkha’nti jānanto aparampi accantatikhiṇaṁ kodhadukkhaṁ
anya-e0103n3:112_7: uppādeyya, attasuññatañca bujjhitvā puna sammohaṁ āpajjeyyā”ti.
anya-e0103n3:113_0: Tena vuttaṁ “pubbabhāgiyānaṁ sīlasampadādīnaṁ sādhanavasena lokuttarānaṁ, upanissayabhāvena
anya-e0103n3:113_1: ca sampanno ajjhāsayo etassāti sampannajjhāsayo”ti. Tenāha “evaṁ tissannaṁ bodhīnaṁ
anya-e0103n3:114_0: Idāni te ajjhāsaye pāḷiyāva vibhāvetuṁ “yathāhā”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha chāti gaṇanaparicchedo.
anya-e0103n3:114_1: Ajjhāsayāti paricchinnadhammanidassanaṁ. Ubhayaṁ pana ekajjhaṁ katvā chabbidhā ajjhāsayāti
anya-e0103n3:114_2: attho. Bodhisattāti bujjhanakasattā, bodhiyā vā niyatabhāvena sattā laggā, adhimuttā
anya-e0103n3:114_3: tanninnā tappoṇāti attho. Bodhiparipākāya saṁvattantīti yathābhinīhāraṁ attanā pattabbabodhiyā
anya-e0103n3:114_4: paripācanāya bhavanti. Alobhajjhāsayāti alubbhanākārena pavattaajjhāsayā, ādito “kathaṁ
anya-e0103n3:114_5: nu kho mayaṁ sabbattha, sabbadā ca aluddhā eva hessāmā”ti, majjhe ca alubbhanavaseneva,
anya-e0103n3:114_6: pacchā ca tasseva rocanavasena pavattaajjhāsayā. Lobhe dosadassāvinoti lubbhanalakkhaṇe
anya-e0103n3:114_7: lobhe sabbappakārena ādīnavadassāvino. Idaṁ tassa ajjhāsayassa ekadesato brūhanākāradassanaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:114_8: Lobhe hi ādīnavaṁ, alobhe ca ānisaṁsaṁ passantassa alobhajjhāsayo parivaḍḍhati, svāyaṁ
anya-e0103n3:114_9: tattha ādīnavānisaṁsadassanavidhi vibhāvitoyeva. Sesapadesupi iminā nayena attho
anya-e0103n3:114_10: veditabbo. Ayaṁ pana viseso – nekkhammanti idha pabbajjā. Paviveko tadaṅgaviveko,
anya-e0103n3:114_11: vikkhambhanaviveko, kāyaviveko, cittaviveko ca. Nissaraṇaṁ nibbānaṁ. Sabbabhavagatīsūti
anya-e0103n3:114_12: sabbesu bhavesu, sabbāsu ca gatīsu. Tadadhimuttatāyāti yadatthaṁ bhāvanānuyogo, yadatthā
anya-e0103n3:115_0: 50.“Kiṁ caritosī”ti pucchito sace “na jānāmī”ti vadeyya, “ke vā te dhammā bahulaṁ
anya-e0103n3:115_1: samudācarantī”ti pucchitabbo. Kiṁ vāti kiṁ asubhaṁ vā anussatiṭṭhānaṁ vā aññaṁ vā.
anya-e0103n3:115_2: Kiṁ te manasi karoto phāsu hotīti cittassa ekaggabhāvena sukhaṁ hoti. Cittaṁ namatīti
anya-e0103n3:115_3: pakatiyāva abhirativasena namati. Evamādīhīti ādi-saddena iriyāpathādīnaṁ saṅgaho
anya-e0103n3:115_4: daṭṭhabbo. Tepi hi na sabbassa ekaṁsato byabhicārino eva. Tathā hi samudācāro pucchitabbo
anya-e0103n3:115_5: vutto. “Asukañca asukañca manasikāravidhiṁ katipayadivasaṁ anuyuñjāhī”ti ca vattabbo.
anya-e0103n3:116_0: “Pakatiyā uggahitakammaṭṭhānassā”ti idaṁ yaṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetukāmo, tattha sajjhāyavasena
